ã„ã¤ã®é–“ã«ã‹å‹•ã‹ãªããªã£ã¦ã„ãŸ rabbit (2.1.1) ãŒ brew reinstall ã§å‹•ãã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ãŸã¨ã„ã†è©±ã§ã™ã€‚

entry.title: Mac ã§ rabbiter ãŒå‹•ã„ãŸ
entry.content:
homebrew ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸ Mac OS X 10.8.4 ç’°å¢ƒã§ rabbiter (2.0.1) ãŒå‹•ãã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

rabbiter ã® issues ã«å ±å‘Šã—ã¦ã„ãŸ show_uri ã®å•é¡Œ ã¨ glib-networking ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆè¨¼æ˜æ›¸ã®å•é¡Œ ãŒè§£æ±ºã—ãŸã®ã§ã€ glib-networking ã‚’ brew reinstall glib-networking --with-curl-ca-bundle ã§ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã™ã‚Œã°ä½¿ãˆã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ã¡ãªã¿ã«ã€åˆå›ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ã‚‚ brew install ã§ã¯ãªã brew reinstall ã§å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ã®ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã« configure ã« --with-ca-certificates ãŒä»˜ã„ã¦ã„ã‚Œã°ä½¿ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚

% brew reinstall glib-networking --with-curl-ca-bundle ==> Reinstalling glib-networking --with-curl-ca-bundle ==> Downloading http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/glib-networking/2.36/glib-networkin Already downloaded: /Library/Caches/Homebrew/glib-networking-2.36.2.tar.xz ==> ./configure --with-ca-certificates=/usr/local/opt/curl-ca-bundle/share/ca-bundle.crt - ==> make install ğŸº /usr/local/Cellar/glib-networking/2.36.2: 68 files, 352K, built in 18 seconds

ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã« configure ã« --without-ca-certificates ã¨ä»˜ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯ rabbiter ãŒä½¿ãˆã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

% brew reinstall glib-networking ==> Reinstalling glib-networking ==> Downloading http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/glib-networking/2.36/glib-networkin Already downloaded: /Library/Caches/Homebrew/glib-networking-2.36.2.tar.xz ==> ./configure --without-ca-certificates --prefix=/usr/local/Cellar/glib-networking/2.36. ==> make install ğŸº /usr/local/Cellar/glib-networking/2.36.2: 68 files, 352K, built in 21 seconds
